<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get agent's Buy recommendations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/agent/buy/{agent_id}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Get the buy recommendations for an agent. This endpoint lists
the tokens for which this agent made a BUY call. It keeps a track of the peak
that happened after the agent made this call. This endpoint is useful to know
the maximum potential profit that could have been made on this buy call.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
